ifnone[source]

ifnone(a, b)

b if a is None else a

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

make_date[source]

make_date(df, date_field)

Make sure df[date_field] is of the right date type.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

add_datepart[source]

add_datepart(df, field_name, prefix=None, drop=True, time=False)

Helper function that adds columns relevant to a date in the column field_name of df.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

add_lag_features[source]

add_lag_features(df, field_name, prefix=None, lag_periods=[1])

Helper function that adds lag features relevant to the column field_name of df.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

add_lag_percentage_gain_features[source]

add_lag_percentage_gain_features(df, field_name, prefix=None, lag_periods=[1])

Helper function that adds lag percentage gain features relevant to the column field_name of df.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

add_moving_average_features[source]

add_moving_average_features(df, field_name, prefix=None, windows=[3], weighted=True)

Helper function that adds moving average (rolling window) features relevant to the column field_name of df.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

add_moving_average_percentage_gain_features[source]

add_moving_average_percentage_gain_features(df, field_name, prefix=None, windows=[3], weighted=True)

Helper function that adds moving average (rolling window) percentage gain features relevant to the column field_name of df.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

add_expanding_features[source]

add_expanding_features(df, field_name, prefix=None, period=7)

Helper function that adds expanding features relevant to the column field_name of df.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

add_trend_features[source]

add_trend_features(df, field_name, prefix=None, windows=[3])

Helper function that adds trend features relevant to the column field_name of df.
